S

selectionSort() - Method in class Deck
Sorts the cards array via selection sort with O(n^2) efficiency
setCards(Card[]) - Method in class Deck
Sets the value of cards according to the value of c - will instantiate new values for each Card rather than using the same memory addresses
setRank(int) - Method in class Card
Sets the rank field to the value of r
setRank(String) - Method in class Card
Sets the rank field to an integer equivalent to r If r is not one of the accepted rank values, rank is assigned the value 0
setSuit(int) - Method in class Card
Sets the suit to the String value associated with the int value s
setSuit(String) - Method in class Card
Sets the suit field to the value of s If s is not an accepted value, the lowest ranking suit value is assigned to suit instead
shuffle() - Method in class Deck
Randomly shuffles the cards array, leaving empty indices at the back end of the array
SUITS - Variable in class Card
